thread.title: Argentina 2015 nº 011 - CERRO FITZ ROY!

title: Argentina 2015 nº 011 - CERRO FITZ ROY!
text:
Only registered TrekEarth members may write critiques. Photographer's Note 
Série sobre a minha viagem à ARGENTINA - visitando El Calafate e El Chaltén (Província de Santa Cruz) - Patagônia e San Martin de los Andes (Província de Neuquén) - De 18 de julho a 07 de Agosto de 2015 - Nº 011 ! Series on my trip to ARGENTINA - visiting El Calafate and El Chaltén (Province of Santa Cruz) - Patagonia and San Martin de los Andes (Province of Neuquén) - From July 18th to August 7th 2015 - #011 ! CERRO FITZ ROY DESDE EL MIRADOR FITZ ROY ! MONTE FITZ ROY VISTO DO MIRANTE FITZ ROY ! MOUNT FITZ ROY SEEN FROM THE FITZ ROY LOOK-OUT POINT ! I love cold weather and that's why I decided to go to Southern Argentina on my last vacations!! I knew weather in Patagonia could be tough though, but I took the risk! I faced bad weather and other problems during my traveling, but, no regrets, because I could see many places I wanted to! There were days that weather was fine and I didn't do anything very special, but enjoyed just as well! But that day, I had the best trekking, with fresh snow along the trails and the best views from Mount Fitz Roy! Here, I was at the FITZ ROY LOOK-OUT POINT! I might go back there in summer, because it's easier to walk along the trails and the days are much longer! 1965 photos posted on TE! 1965, the year I was born, 50 years ago!!! Some picture data:
